Room.Name: Thoto's Emporium
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a shabby little emporium which sells a variety of goods.
Room.LongDescription: Thoto the gnome opened this shop the day the room was completed when the castle was built. He has been in business here for a very long time, and doesn't mind cheating you out of a month's pay. No guarantees with anything you purchase in here.
